title: suggestions for Type/Color for Indian clothing and jewelery store
content:
Hi guys,

Looking for some suggestions for design for a logo for an indian clothing store.  
The store sells traditional indian fabrics, both stiched and unstitched, many prints, clothing with extensive hand embroidery, and bead work,fancy bridal pieces that are custom stitched, custom crystal jewelery (fused between western and traditional indian designs). The store it self is currently under construction and will boast a boutique look, with wood floors, custom fixtures etc. The owners would like to use bits and pieces of color from the logo to compliment the interior.

target: Indian decent women (18-40) who have minimal desire to travel abroad to shop for special events/ weddings.

The logo will be used in full color, and needs to read well from the signage. approx 6x 12 feet.

any creative direction would help. type, color, logo ideas etc....

Thanks in advance guys!

Zed.
author: Zed

comments.content:
Consider calligraphy for your logo! Otherwise, I will give a font some thought.  
Ann

This is going to come off completely the wrong way but does anyone bother to design anymore? Seems a bit lazy to provide a brief and ask everyone for input without first lifting a pencil of your own. Bring design concepts along with colors and typefaces options to the table and I'm sure you'll get some constructive feedback.

I look forward to seeing what YOU come up with.
You should hire a graphic designer.

Thanks guys for all the advice!

Ann, do have any particular ones in mind?

I have a few color schemes in mind that I will be posting here shortly, and once i get a few ideas should revert back with some design concepts as well.
